xsum.src: 17 may 2017 last updated at 06:49 bst around 9,000 people were killed , and more than 8 million affected by the earthquake - roughly a quarter of the country 's population it also caused massive damage to roads and buildings , with schools closed and people left homeless . but as time passes things are slowly starting to return to normal , and aid organisations like world vision are helping people get their lives back on track .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Le tremblement de terre de mai 2017 au Népal a eu un impact dévastateur sur tout le pays, mais avec l'aide des organisations d'aide, les choses se rétablissent.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Le 25 avril 2015, un tremblement de terre de magnitude 7,8 a dévasté le Népal, causant la mort de milliers de personnes et touchant des millions d'autres. Les infrastructures ont été gravement endommagées et de nombreuses personnes se sont retrouvées sans abri. Cependant, grâce à l'aide d'organisations telles que World Vision, la situation commence à s'améliorer et les gens peuvent commencer à reconstruire leur vie.

xsum.src: the incident happened at the co-op store in thornton at about 02:15 on 17 may . a ford transit flatbed van , stolen in station road , reversed into the premises . extensive damage was caused to the building and an attempt was made to steal an atm . a 25-year-old man is expected to appear at kirkcaldy sheriff court court on monday . det insp stewart andrew of glenrothes cid said : `` officers have been pursuing various lines of enquiry ever since this incident took place , which has included liaison with our colleagues in durham constabulary . `` i want to thank local residents for their support throughout and reassure the community that we will use all resources at our disposal to investigate such incidents . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: Tôt le matin du 17 mai, un homme conduisant une camionnette à plateau volée a reculé dans une maison pour tenter de voler un guichet automatique, l'homme comparaîtra en cour lundi prochain.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Un homme de 25 ans a été arrêté après qu'une camionnette volée ait été utilisée pour reculer dans un magasin Co-op à Thornton et tenter de voler un distributeur automatique de billets. L'incident s'est produit à 02h15 le 17 mai et a causé des dégâts importants au bâtiment. Les autorités ont collaboré avec la police de Durham pour enquêter sur l'affaire et remercient les résidents locaux pour leur soutien. L'homme devrait comparaître devant le tribunal de Kirkcaldy lundi.

xsum.src: an airport spokesman said the runway had been closed for two periods on sunday - of nine and five minutes - after the drone was sighted . easyjet said four of its flights were diverted , while british airways said one aircraft was diverted to bournemouth . other flights were put into holding patterns as a precaution . the airport said : `` runway operations at gatwick were suspended between 18:10 bst and 18:19 , and again from 18:36 to 18:41 , resulting in a small number of go-arounds and diverts . '' highest near miss , over heathrow in february 2016 50 metres closest drones are allowed to anyone or anything 70 near misses involving drones in 2016 , more than double the year before craig jenkins , who was flying with easyjet from naples , italy , said : `` we were crossing over the channel and it -lsb- the plane -rsb- started circling . `` it did four or five circles ... before the captain said we were landing at stansted . `` first , they said gatwick was closed because of an incident . shortly after , they said it was a drone . '' mr jenkins , from greenwich , south-east london , said passengers were given the choice of disembarking at stansted or waiting an hour to fly back to gatwick . niamh slatter , from sussex , was flying from valencia , spain , when her ba flight was diverted to bournemouth . `` we were due to land 15 minutes early , but ended up circling over the south coast , '' she said . `` our attempted landing at gatwick was aborted quite late as the drone had been spotted again , so we were told that the flight was being diverted to bournemouth . '' easyjet apologised for the inconvenience , saying the circumstances were `` outside '' of the firm 's control . the uk airprox board monitors near-miss incidents . an airprox is the official term for a situation where the distance between aircraft and their relative positions and speed were such that the safety of the aircraft may have been compromised . there were 70 airprox reports involving drones coming close to aircraft over the uk in 2016 - more than double the number for 2015 . there have been 33 incidents up to may 2017 . the civil aviation authority recommends drones be flown at no higher than 400ft . however , the highest airprox involving a drone was at 12,500 ft. of the 142 airprox incidents involving drones recorded since 2010 , 40 of them were near to heathrow . six of them , up to may , had been near to gatwick . in november 2016 , the uk 's drone code was revised and updated to help pilots ensure they fly the gadgets safely . the revised code turned the five main safety tips into a mnemonic , spelling drone , to make it easier to remember . uk revises safe flying drone code the british airline pilots ' association 's flight safety specialist , steve landells , said the threat of drones flown near aircraft `` must be addressed before we see a disaster '' . `` we believe a collision , particularly with a helicopter , has the potential to be catastrophic , '' he said . the union has called for compulsory registration of drone users and said new technology should be considered , including a system where the drone transmits enough data for the police to track down the operator . the civil aviation authority said there were serious consequences for people who broke the rules when flying drones . `` drone users have to understand that when taking to the skies they are potentially flying close to one of the busiest areas of airspace in the world . '' -lsb- it is -rsb- a complex system that brings together all manner of aircraft including passenger aeroplanes , military jets , helicopters , gliders and light aircraft , '' a spokesman said . `` it is totally unacceptable to fly drones close to airports and anyone flouting the rules can face severe penalties including imprisonment . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: La fermeture de la piste de l'aéroport de Gatwick en raison des observations de drones a entraîné des détournements de vols, des modèles pour d'autres vols, des préoccupations accrues concernant la sécurité des drones et des appels à des réglementations plus strictes et des solutions technologiques pour empêcher les collisions catastrophiques potentielles entre les drones et les avions.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Un drone a été repéré à proximité de l'aéroport de Gatwick, entraînant la fermeture temporaire de la piste et le déroutement de plusieurs vols. L'incident s'est produit dimanche soir, avec des fermetures de piste de neuf et cinq minutes. EasyJet et British Airways ont déclaré que certains de leurs vols ont été déroutés vers d'autres aéroports. L'aéroport a déclaré que les opérations ont été suspendues à deux reprises en raison de la présence du drone. Les drones ne sont autorisés à voler qu'à une certaine distance des personnes et des objets, mais en 2016, il y a eu 70 incidents de ce type au Royaume-Uni. Les passagers ont été déroutés vers d'autres aéroports ou ont dû attendre avant de pouvoir atterrir à Gatwick. L'autorité de l'aviation civile a déclaré que les utilisateurs de drones doivent comprendre les conséquences graves de leur non-respect des règles, et que toute personne enfreignant les règles peut faire face à des sanctions sévères, y compris l'emprisonnement.

xsum.src: the possibility of brexit was one of the factors that led the us federal reserve to keep interest rates on hold , chair janet yellen said . the us central bank also said it expected a `` slower path '' for future rate rises . it raised rates in december for the first time in nearly a decade . on the 23 june uk referendum on whether to stay in the european union , ms yellen said : `` clearly this is a very important decision for the united kingdom and for europe . `` it is a decision that could have consequences for economic and financial conditions in global financial markets . `` if it does so it could have consequences in turn for the us economic outlook that would be a factor in deciding on the appropriate path of policy , '' she added . meanwhile , the us treasury cleared all bond sales on the 23 june . lou crandall , chief economist at wrightson icap , told bloomberg business that the treasury alters its auctions calendar to avoid fed monetary policy announcements , and that the uk referendum was a `` similar kind of market event '' . fed policymakers did not reveal when rates might rise , but the door has been left open for an increase when they next meet at the end of july . chair yellen added : `` proceeding cautiously and raising our interest-rate target will allow us to verify that economic growth will return to a moderate pace , that the labor market will strengthen further , and that inflation will continue to make progress toward our 2 % objective . '' the fed said in a statement that the pace of improvement in the labour market had slowed . the bank added , however , that `` economic activity will expand at a moderate pace and labour market indicators will strengthen '' even with gradual rate increases . analysis : andrew walker , bbc news the key consideration in this decision was the us jobs market - with a little help from the uncertainties arising from the forthcoming british referendum and a few other factors . we have had two months where job creation has been disappointing , especially may . the fed chair janet yellen called it `` something of a loss of momentum '' . but she also said signs there were signs that the labour market is `` approaching maximum employment '' and it 's important not to attach too much importance to one data point . she - and , she said , the fed 's policy making committee - did not feel that `` progress in the labour market has come to an end '' . which leaves us -lrb- or at least me -rrb- having to pore over the next jobs report to see how likely a rate rise is in july . at this stage it does n't look very likely , but it is not altogether off the table . the dollar fell against the euro and sterling , but wall street held on to earlier gains , with the s&p 500 up 0.3 % . the fed expected the unemployment rate to stand at 4.7 % by the end of this year , before falling to 4.6 % in 2017 and remain at that level in 2018 . in may , us job creation fell to its lowest level in more than five years , after faltering in april . ms yellen said it was important not to overreact to one or two monthly readings . `` that said , we will be watching the job market carefully , '' she added . the fed now expects the us economy to expand by only 2 % a year for the foreseeable future - slightly lower than the forecast in march . brian jacobsen of wells fargo funds management said : `` it 's as dovish as the fed can get without actually cutting rates . '' aaron kohli of bmo capital markets agreed that the statement appeared `` somewhat dovish '' , adding : `` the market had expected them to moderate their tone a little bit given what 's been going on and given the risk that we have in terms of brexit . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: En raison des inquiétudes concernant le référendum britannique du Brexit et la mauvaise création d'emplois, la Réserve fédérale américaine a choisi de maintenir les taux d'intérêt actuels., Ils prévoient également un rythme plus lent des augmentations de taux futurs.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: La présidente de la Réserve fédérale américaine, Janet Yellen, a déclaré que la possibilité du Brexit a influencé la décision de maintenir les taux d'intérêt inchangés. La Fed s'attend à une "trajectoire plus lente" pour les futures hausses de taux et a annulé toutes les ventes d'obligations le jour du référendum britannique. Les responsables de la Fed n'ont pas révélé quand les taux pourraient augmenter, mais ont laissé la porte ouverte pour une augmentation lors de leur prochaine réunion en juillet. La Fed a également noté que le rythme d'amélioration du marché du travail avait ralenti, mais que l'activité économique devrait continuer à croître à un rythme modéré. La présidente Yellen a souligné l'importance de procéder avec prudence et d'augmenter les taux graduellement pour atteindre l'objectif d'inflation de 2%. La Fed s'attend à ce que le taux de chômage atteigne 4,7% d'ici la fin de l'année et reste à ce niveau en 2018. La création d'emplois aux États-Unis a été décevante ces derniers mois, mais Mme Yellen a souligné qu'il était important de ne pas réagir de manière excessive à un seul point de données. La Fed prévoit désormais une croissance économique de 2% par an pour l'avenir prévisible. Les experts ont noté que la déclaration de la Fed était "accommodante" et que le marché s'attendait à un ton plus modéré compte tenu du risque du Brexit.

xsum.src: 29 june 2015 last updated at 11:41 bst mr richards , 19 , from wednesbury , was among 38 killed when a tunisian student linked to islamic state extremists opened fire on a beach in sousse on friday . he was a walsall fc fan , football referee and student at the university of worcester . chief executive of the birmingham county football association , chad ehlertsen , said `` it just makes you smile every time you think about joel . '' `` he was just a leader of young people ; a good organiser , a good communicator and an extremely talented young referee , '' mr ehlertsen said .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Vendredi, une fusillade avec des extrémistes de l'État islamique à Sousse Beach a tué 38 personnes, dont Joel Richards de l'Université de Worcester, âgée de 19 ans.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Joel Richards, a 19-year-old man from Wednesbury, was killed in the terrorist attack in Sousse, Tunisia on Friday, June 26, 2015. He was one of the 38 victims when a Tunisian student linked to ISIS opened fire on a beach. Joel was a fan of the Walsall football club, a football referee, and a student at the University of Worcester. The CEO of the Birmingham County Football Association, Chad Ehlertsen, said, "Thinking of Joel always brings a smile to your face." "He was a leader for young people; a good organizer, a good communicator, and an extremely talented young referee," added Mr. Ehlertsen.

xsum.src: media playback is unsupported on your device 24 june 2015 last updated at 13:21 bst 59-year-old vivian gabb , a pilates and tennis coach from london , was in the final stages of buying a house when the scammers struck . she was unaware that her email had been hacked and every email she wrote and received was being monitored by criminals . they sent her a message disguised as a follow-up email from her solicitor , asking for nearly # 50,000 to be paid into their account . the internet safety advice website get safe online says more than half -lrb- 51 % -rrb- of people in the uk have been a victim of an online crime , and 15 % of people have been victims of either attempted or successful hacks of their email account . watch victoria derbyshire on weekdays from 09:15 -11:00 bst on bbc two and bbc news channel . follow the programme on facebook and twitter , and find all our content online .

xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Le 24 juin 2015, Vivian Gabb, une coach de Pilates et de tennis de Londres, a été victime d'une escroquerie lors de l'achat d'une maison. Son e-mail avait été piraté et les escrocs ont réussi à lui soutirer près de 50 000 £ en se faisant passer pour son avocat. Selon Get Safe Online, plus de la moitié des personnes au Royaume-Uni ont été victimes d'un crime en ligne et 15 % ont été victimes de piratages de leur compte e-mail. Le programme Victoria Derbyshire sur BBC Two et BBC News Channel traite de ce sujet en semaine de 9h15 à 11h00 BST. Suivez le programme sur les réseaux sociaux et retrouvez tout le contenu en ligne.

xsum.src: the advocacy group glaad analysed shows seen or to be shown between june 2016 and may 2017 and counted 278 regular and recurring lgbt characters . the number of transgender characters has risen from seven to 16 this year . but glaad bemoaned the fact that more than 25 lesbian and bisexual female characters died or were killed off . they include the characters poussey washington and bea smith , who met violent ends in orange is the new black and wentworth respectively . the report also found a record high percentage of black characters on broadcast television , thanks mostly to shows like empire , luke cage and how to get away with murder . glaad 's where we are on tv study based its findings on scripted broadcast , cable and streaming series already being shown or for which casting had been confirmed . glaad 's president sarah kate ellis said it was `` heartening to see progress being made '' but said numbers were `` only part of the story '' . follow us on twitter @bbcnewsents , on instagram at bbcnewsents , or if you have a story suggestion email entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk .
xsum.element-aware_summary: L'étude de GLAAD a découvert une augmentation des personnages LGBT et transgenres dans les émissions entre juin 2016 et mai 2017, soulevant des inquiétudes concernant la tendance récurrente de la mort des lesbiennes et des femmes bisexuelles.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Le groupe de défense GLAAD a publié un rapport sur la représentation des personnages LGBT à la télévision entre juin 2016 et mai 2017. Le rapport a révélé une augmentation du nombre de personnages transgenres, mais a également déploré la mort de plus de 25 personnages lesbiennes et bisexuelles. Il a également noté un pourcentage record de personnages noirs à la télévision. La présidente de GLAAD a salué les progrès réalisés, mais a souligné que les chiffres ne racontent pas toute l'histoire. Les lecteurs peuvent suivre les mises à jour sur les réseaux sociaux et soumettre des suggestions d'articles par email.

xsum.src: two women lost a leg and three other people were seriously hurt when their carriage hit a stationary carriage on the smiler ride on 2 june . the ride , which has been closed since the accident , is to reopen on 19 march when the staffordshire theme park reopens for its new season . the owner of the attraction is to be prosecuted over the crash . merlin attractions operation ltd will appear at north staffordshire justice centre on 22 april , the health and safety executive announced last week . four people sitting in the front row of the carriage were among those most seriously hurt in the crash . for updates on this and other staffordshire stories vicky balch , 20 , from lancashire , had six rounds of surgery in a bid to save her leg before needing an amputation . leah washington , 17 , from barnsley , also had one of her legs amputated , while her 18-year-old boyfriend , joe pugh , shattered his knees . daniel thorpe , 27 , from buxton , derbyshire , was treated for a collapsed lung and leg injuries . the fifth person , chanda chauhan , 49 , from wednesbury , underwent surgery after suffering internal injuries .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Le parc à thème du Staffordshire sera réaménagé le 19 mars, alors que le trajet a été fermé depuis le 2 juin de l'année dernière en raison d'une défaillance de l'installation qui a causé cinq blessures, le parc sera poursuivi le 22 avril.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Deux femmes ont perdu une jambe et trois autres personnes ont été gravement blessées lorsqu'un chariot a heurté un chariot stationnaire sur le manège Smiler le 2 juin. Le manège, fermé depuis l'accident, rouvrira le 19 mars lorsque le parc d'attractions de Staffordshire reprendra sa nouvelle saison. Le propriétaire de l'attraction sera poursuivi pour l'accident et comparaîtra devant le tribunal le 22 avril. Quatre personnes assises au premier rang du chariot ont été gravement blessées, dont Vicky Balch, 20 ans, qui a subi six interventions chirurgicales avant de devoir subir une amputation. Leah Washington, 17 ans, a également subi une amputation d'une jambe, tandis que son petit ami a eu les genoux brisés. Un autre passager a été traité pour un poumon effondré et des blessures aux jambes, et une cinquième personne a subi une intervention chirurgicale pour des blessures internes.

xsum.src: activists want to stop the consumption of dog meat at the festival in the southern city of yulin which is due to begin later this month . correspondents say animal rights is a growing concern in china . there have been frequent calls to treat animals more humanely . about 24 activists accompanied by their dogs handed in the petition at the representative office of yulin city in the chinese capital , beijing . they unfurled banners with pictures of their pets alongside the message : `` i 'm not your dinner . '' the annual festival - due to begin on 21 june - involves the slaughter of thousands of dogs for human consumption . figures cited by the washington post say about 30 million dogs are killed across asia every year for their meat , with more than a third of that number killed in china . opponents say many dogs are either stolen or are strays rounded up for the festival . they say many are caged in cramped conditions before being killed . campaigning group humane society international has described the yulin event as a `` nightmare not a festival '' . supporters of the festival argue that dog meat is good for people and eating canines is no different from consuming any other meat . in 2014 , the yulin government distanced itself from the festival , arguing it was organised by private business people and did not have official backing . celebrities including british comedian ricky gervais have criticised the festival along with chinese pop star chen kun and actors yang mi and fan bingbing . the tradition of eating dog meat dates back four or five hundred years in china , south korea and other countries , as it is believed to ward off the heat of the summer months , according to state news agency xinhua . however , the yulin festival only began in recent years , xinhua reported last year .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Des militants des droits des animaux en Chine ont soumis une pétition appelant à la fin du festival annuel où des milliers de chiens sont abattus pour la consommation humaine, tandis que les partisans soutiennent que la viande de chien n'est pas différente des autres types de viande.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Des militants pour les droits des animaux ont remis une pétition de 11 millions de signatures aux autorités chinoises pour demander l'arrêt de la consommation de viande de chien lors du festival de Yulin. Ce festival annuel implique l'abattage de milliers de chiens pour la consommation humaine, ce qui suscite de nombreuses critiques et protestations. Les militants ont déployé des banderoles avec des photos de leurs animaux de compagnie accompagnées du message "Je ne suis pas votre dîner". Les opposants affirment que de nombreux chiens sont volés ou sont des chiens errants rassemblés pour le festival et sont tués dans des conditions inhumaines. Les partisans du festival font valoir que la viande de chien est bonne pour les gens et que manger des canidés n'est pas différent de consommer n'importe quelle autre viande. Le gouvernement de Yulin s'est distancé du festival en 2014, mais il continue d'être organisé par des entrepreneurs privés. La tradition de manger de la viande de chien remonte à plusieurs siècles en Chine et dans d'autres pays, mais le festival de Yulin n'a commencé que récemment.

xsum.src: the 65-year-old was found dead in the garden of his gated home in south weald in june 2015 . although essex police originally thought he died of natural causes , it emerged he had been shot six times . police said they had questioned a man originally from tyneside but currently living in southern spain . the force says the man was not arrested but volunteered to be interviewed at a police station in the uk . the force did not specify which police station he was interviewed at . the interview took place on saturday morning . an inquest into palmer 's death concluded he was unlawfully killed . police have said his shooting had `` all the hallmarks of a professional hit '' . palmer , once described as britain 's richest criminal and thought to have been worth # 300m , got his nickname after he was arrested on suspicion of melting down gold from the brink 's - mat robbery , although he was never convicted . the robbery in 1983 took place at heathrow airport when # 25m worth of gold was stolen . at the time it was the biggest robbery to have ever taken place in the uk . the former scrap metal dealer , from olton , near birmingham , who was one of seven children , was said to have melted the metal down in the back garden of his mansion at lansdown near bath . however , he denied knowing it was stolen and was acquitted in 1987 , blowing kisses to the jury from the dock when the verdict was delivered . worth about # 500m in today 's prices , most of the gold has never been recovered and the case remains open . in 1997 palmer was arrested in tenerife , and returned to the uk to face charges related to a large-scale timeshare fraud . in may 2001 he was sentenced to eight years in prison and ordered to pay a record confiscation order of # 33m .
xsum.element-aware_summary: En juin 2015, un homme de 65 ans a été abattu six fois et mort dans le jardin de leur maison, ce qui a conduit à une enquête impliquant la police d'Essex et un homme de Tyneside vivant en Espagne, tandis que l'homme décédé, John Palmer, avait unpassé controversé, y compris une prétendue implication dans le vol de mates du bord et une fraude en temps partagé.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Un homme a été interrogé par la police dans le cadre de l'enquête sur le meurtre de John "Goldfinger" Palmer, dont le corps a été retrouvé sans vie dans son jardin en juin 2015. Bien qu'initialement considéré comme mort de causes naturelles, il a été découvert qu'il avait été abattu six fois. La police a interrogé un homme originaire de Tyneside vivant en Espagne, mais il n'a pas été arrêté. Palmer, surnommé le criminel le plus riche de Grande-Bretagne, a été acquitté en 1987 pour avoir fondu de l'or provenant du braquage de Brink's-Mat. En 1997, il a été arrêté pour fraude et condamné à huit ans de prison et à payer une amende record de 33 millions de livres.

xsum.src: the body of malcolm ballantyne , known as malky , was found at his home in glebe place by a family member shortly after 13:00 on friday . a post-mortem examination is taking place but police are treating the death as suspicious . officers are trying to trace mr ballantyne 's movements on thursday and friday and are also checking cctv . det ch insp gary cunningham said : `` malky was found yesterday by a family member who is obviously distraught at what has happened . `` he is a well-known character in the area and has a routine where he visits and socialises in various pubs in stevenson most days - generally in the morning . `` we are keen to find out if anyone saw malky between 1000 hours on thursday 20 august and 1300 hours on friday 21 august . '' door-to-door inquiries are taking place in saltcoats and stevenson and there are extra uniformed patrols in the area .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Le corps de Malcolm Ballantyne a été retrouvé à domicile le vendredi après-midi, 21 août, et la police enquête de toute urgence sur la cause du décès.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Le corps de Malcolm Ballantyne, surnommé Malky, a été retrouvé à son domicile de Glebe Place par un membre de sa famille vendredi après-midi. La police traite sa mort comme suspecte et mène une autopsie. Les enquêteurs tentent de retracer ses déplacements et vérifient les caméras de surveillance. Le détective-chef inspecteur Gary Cunningham a déclaré que Malky était un personnage bien connu de la région et qu'il avait l'habitude de visiter et de socialiser dans différents pubs de Stevenson. Des enquêtes de porte à porte sont en cours et des patrouilles supplémentaires ont été mises en place dans la région. La police demande à toute personne ayant vu Malky entre le jeudi 20 août à 10h00 et le vendredi 21 août à 13h00 de se manifester.

xsum.src: south wales police said david ellis , 40 , his lodger , has been arrested in ireland . officers are liaising with garda officers in connection with his extradition back to the uk . retired telecoms engineer mr warburton , 59 , has not been seen since 31 july . police launched an appeal for information after he went missing ; they said his m-reg peugeot 205 had been spotted in north wales before returning to swansea . the car was found abandoned at birkenhead port some days later . police said mr ellis , who had been mr warburton 's lodger in sketty , had stepped off a ferry in belfast , northern ireland , on 6 august . that discovery prompted a fresh appeal for information and led to welsh officers being sent across the irish sea . south wales police said mr warburton 's family had been informed of the latest development in the investigation and continued to be assisted by family liaison officers . mr warburton 's body has not been found ; detectives have previously said they are treating the incident as murder .
xsum.element-aware_summary: David Ellis, le logement de M. Warburton qui a disparu le 31 juillet, a été arrêté en Irlande et attend une extradition, tandis que l'enquête sur la disparition de M. Warburton se poursuit, avec des efforts de collaboration entre la police du sud du Pays de Galles et la Garda.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: La police du sud du Pays de Galles a arrêté David Ellis, 40 ans, en Irlande et collabore avec la garde pour son extradition. M. Warburton, un ingénieur à la retraite de 59 ans, est porté disparu depuis le 31 juillet. Sa voiture a été repérée dans le nord du Pays de Galles avant d'être retrouvée abandonnée au port de Birkenhead. M. Ellis, ancien locataire de M. Warburton, a été vu débarquant d'un ferry à Belfast le 6 août, ce qui a conduit à un nouvel appel à témoins et à l'envoi d'agents gallois en Irlande. La famille de M. Warburton a été informée de ces développements et continue d'être assistée par des agents de liaison familiale. Le corps de M. Warburton n'a pas été retrouvé et l'incident est traité comme un meurtre par les enquêteurs.

xsum.src: tuilagi , 23 , is still recovering from the injury he suffered in october . cockerill is confident tuilagi will return in time to play at the world cup for the national side , who came close to winning the six nations without him . `` he 's improving all the time but the likelihood now is he may not play this season , '' he told bbc radio 5 live . `` the likelihood is he will be fit for june and he 'll join england for their world cup camp . `` hopefully he 'll be involved in the world cup warm-ups and have a huge say in how england do . '' stuart lancaster 's tournament hosts get their world cup campaign under way against fiji at twickenham on 18 september . before that , they face warm-up fixtures against france in august , both home and away , before a final run-out against ireland at twickenham on 5 september . samoa-born tuilagi has won 25 caps and scored 11 tries for england , while also featuring once for the british and irish lions . his last international outing came during england 's 3-0 series defeat to new zealand in june . as part of his treatment , tuilagi has had prolotherapy - involving injections of a sugar solution .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Manu Tuilagi, qui se remet actuellement d'une blessure, devrait être apte à la campagne de la Coupe du monde de l'Angleterre en juin, l'équipe se rapprochant des six nations sans lui.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Manu Tuilagi, le centre anglais de 23 ans, se remet toujours de sa blessure d'octobre et devrait être de retour pour la Coupe du Monde. Son entraîneur, Cockerill, est confiant qu'il sera en forme pour rejoindre l'équipe nationale en juin et participer aux matchs de préparation. xsum.src: police have been searching the site in milton , cambridgeshire , for five weeks . despite a high-profile missing persons campaign , it is thought by police he ended up in a bin lorry . mr mckeague 's father martin said it was `` breathtaking '' to see how much waste officers have combed through . live : updates on this story and other suffolk news he has been to the site five times and is staying in a nearby campsite with his wife trish . `` it 's heartbreaking to think when you are there corrie could be under foot , '' he said . `` everything leads to corrie being there and when i 'm looking at and watching these guys rake through , i know the police would n't be here going through all these tonnes of rubbish if they did n't expect corrie to be there . '' mr mckeague , from dunfermline in fife , vanished while on a night out in bury st edmunds , suffolk , on 24 september . he was last seen on cctv at about 03:25 bst . a bin lorry collected refuse a short time later from the area the raf honington gunner was last seen . suffolk police said officers were trawling through 60 tonnes a day at the site in milton , near cambridge . the search is now in its fifth week and is expected to take up to 10 .
xsum.element-aware_summary: M. McKeague a disparu une nuit à Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk, le 24 septembre, et la police pense qu'il a finalement été emmené par un camion à ordures, qui a été recherché pendant cinq semaines, mais reste non concluant.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: La police a passé cinq semaines à la recherche du site à Milton, dans le Cambridgeshire, où le jeune homme Corrie Mckeague a disparu. Malgré une campagne médiatique pour retrouver le jeune homme, la police pense qu'il a fini dans un camion à ordures. Son père, Martin, a déclaré que c'était bouleversant de voir les déchets que les agents ont parcourus. Il est actuellement sur le site pour la cinquième fois et reste dans un camping à proximité avec sa femme. La police pense que Corrie pourrait être sous leurs pieds et continue de fouiller les tonnes de déchets. Corrie a disparu lors d'une soirée à Bury St Edmunds et a été vu pour la dernière fois sur une caméra de surveillance. La police parcourt 60 tonnes de déchets par jour sur le site et la recherche devrait durer jusqu'à 10 semaines.

xsum.src: the crucible 's production of show boat and its new musical flowers for mrs harris are both up for best musical . paapa essiedu , the royal shakespeare company 's first black hamlet , is in the running for best performance in a play . sir ian mckellen will receive a special prize at this year 's event , to be held at london 's guildhall on 9 october . previous recipients of the outstanding contribution to british theatre award include sir peter hall , choreographer sir matthew bourne and actor simon callow . clare burt is nominated for best performance in a musical for flowers for mrs harris , which was adapted from a 1958 novel by paul gallico . daniel evans directed both flowers for mrs harris and show boat , which transferred to the west end in april . he has since left sheffield theatres to become artistic director of chichester festival theatre . chichester 's exuberant summer production of half a sixpence is up for two awards ahead of its west end transfer next month . actress lesley manville , host of this year 's awards ceremony , said she `` looked forward to celebrating a year of artistic achievement '' . the full list of nominations is as follows : theatregoers have until 12:00 bst on 19 september to cast their vote for the uk 's most welcoming theatre . follow us on twitter @bbcnewsents , on instagram , or if you have a story suggestion email entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Le Boat et les fleurs du Crucible pour Mme Harris sont prêts pour la meilleure comédie musicale, Paapa Essiedu est nominée pour la meilleure performance d'une pièce, et Ian McKellen sera honoré lors de l'événement des prix le 9 octobre.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: La production de The Crucible de Show Boat et la nouvelle comédie musicale Flowers for Mrs Harris sont en lice pour le meilleur musical aux prix du théâtre britannique. Paapa Essiedu, le premier Hamlet noir de la Royal Shakespeare Company, est nominé pour la meilleure performance dans une pièce. Sir Ian McKellen recevra un prix spécial lors de l'événement qui se tiendra à la Guildhall de Londres le 9 octobre. Clare Burt est également nominée pour la meilleure performance dans une comédie musicale pour Flowers for Mrs Harris. La production estivale de Half a Sixpence de Chichester est en lice pour deux prix avant son transfert dans le West End le mois prochain. Lesley Manville, animatrice de la cérémonie, a déclaré qu'elle était impatiente de célébrer une année de réussite artistique. Les spectateurs ont jusqu'au 19 septembre pour voter pour le théâtre le plus accueillant du Royaume-Uni.

xsum.src: anthony kevin morais went missing on 4 september after leaving his house . police said they had arrested seven suspects in the case , one of whom led them to the body early on wednesday . one of the suspects was involved in a corruption case prosecuted by mr morais recently , local media quoted police as saying . the 52-year-old armed forces medical officer is believed to have contracted the other suspects , the star quoted police as saying . police were led to a river at 06:00 local time on wednesday , comm datuk seri mohmad salleh , director of the criminal investigation department , told reporters . divers confirmed the oil drum was in the river and a forklift was used to hoist it out of the water , he said . the body was found after the oil drum was broken open . cctv footage showed mr morais 's car being trailed by another vehicle which rammed into him . he was abducted after the collision , police said . the body has been sent to a kuala lumpur hospital for post mortem examination .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Anthony Kevin Morais, qui a disparu après avoir quitté la maison le 4 septembre, a été retrouvé mort dans un tambour pétrolier dans une rivière mercredi, et une autopsie est en cours.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Anthony Kevin Morais a disparu le 4 septembre après avoir quitté sa maison. La police a arrêté sept suspects, dont l'un a conduit les autorités à son corps. Le médecin militaire de 52 ans était impliqué dans une affaire de corruption et aurait contracté les autres suspects. Le corps a été retrouvé dans une rivière après que les plongeurs aient confirmé la présence d'un fût d'huile. Des images de vidéosurveillance ont montré que sa voiture avait été suivie et qu'il avait été enlevé après une collision. Le corps a été envoyé à l'hôpital pour une autopsie.

xsum.src: a 20-year-old man was with a male friend in old rutherglen road when another man attacked him with a weapon at about 13:05 on 22 september . the victim was treated in hospital for a leg injury . detectives believe the man in the images may be able to help with their inquiry . he is described as white , aged about 20 , with short brown hair . at the time of the incident , he was wearing a tracksuit top that was white at the front and light blue at the back , dark tracksuit trousers and dark trainers . he was last seen walking on caledonia road towards cathcart road . det con nicol mcpherson said : `` this was a violent attack that took place in broad daylight which left this man with a serious leg injury . `` i would urge anyone who recognises the man in the images , or who has information that may assist the investigation to contact cathcart police office . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: Deux hommes ont été attaqués sur Old Rutherglen Road vers 13h05 le 22 septembre, entraînant une blessure à la jambe, la police enquête sur les informations sur l'agresseur.

xsum.src: network rail is doing work in the chipping sodbury and alderton tunnels and building a new platform at bristol parkway . the improvements will run from saturday until 15 september . they will allow new trains to run on the great western rail mainline , including new intercity express trains . for the duration of the works , those travelling between south wales and london should note : for those travelling to and from south wales during the august bank holiday weekend from 26 august to 28 august : during the weekends from 23-24 september until 18-19 november , there will be further improvement work affecting south wales and bristol parkway services . passengers are advised to check their journeys .

D'autres travaux auront lieu pendant les week-ends du 23-24 septembre jusqu'au 18-19 novembre, ce qui affectera également les services du sud du Pays de Galles et de Bristol Parkway. Les passagers sont invités à vérifier leurs trajets pendant cette période.

xsum.src: hasan karkardi has been suspended for six months for sparring with blackwell , who was left requiring surgery to reduce swelling on his brain . the british boxing board of control said wilkins ' conduct was `` detrimental to the interests of boxing '' . blackwell , 26 , retired after suffering a bleed on the skull in march . he spent a week in an induced coma after losing his british middleweight title fight with chris eubank jr. . despite blackwell not having a licence to fight , and despite him being advised not to return to the ring , he sparred with karkardi , 29 , on 22 november at a boxing club in devizes , wiltshire . on wednesday , a family member told bbc sport blackwell is still unable to walk , and a year away from making a full recovery .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Le boxeur Hassan Karkadi a été suspendu pendant six mois par le British Boxing Board of Control for Boxing avec Blackwell, qui a subi une lésion cérébrale, le 22 novembre.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Le boxeur britannique Hasan Karkardi a été suspendu pendant six mois pour avoir combattu avec Nick Blackwell, qui a subi une intervention chirurgicale pour réduire un gonflement au cerveau. La British Boxing Board of Control a déclaré que le comportement de Wilkins était préjudiciable aux intérêts de la boxe. Blackwell, âgé de 26 ans, a pris sa retraite après avoir subi une hémorragie au crâne en mars. Malgré le fait qu'il n'ait pas de licence pour combattre et qu'il ait été conseillé de ne pas retourner sur le ring, il a combattu avec Karkardi, âgé de 29 ans, le 22 novembre. Blackwell est toujours incapable de marcher et il lui faudra un an pour se rétablir complètement.

xsum.src: gary price was suspended from all council duties for five months in november after powys council 's standards committee ruled he had breached the code of conduct . his appeal has been dismissed by the adjudication panel for wales following a two-day hearing in llandrindod wells . mr price has been contacted for comment . he was found to have sent information which the council said `` incorrectly and unfairly '' portrayed what happened at a grievance appeal hearing , in which he was a panel member . the adjudication panel for wales unanimously agreed to refer the matter back to the standards committee with a recommendation that mr price be suspended for three months . council leader barry thomas said the decision `` sends out a clear message that those who enter public office have to operate within the members ' code of conduct and maintain the highest possible standards '' .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Gary Price a été suspendu de tous les fonctions du conseil en novembre pour avoir violé le code de conduite.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Le conseiller du comté de Powys, Gwilym Price, a été suspendu de ses fonctions pendant cinq mois après avoir enfreint le code de conduite du conseil. Son appel a été rejeté par le panel d'arbitrage pour le Pays de Galles. Il a été reconnu coupable d'avoir envoyé des informations incorrectes et injustes lors d'une audience d'appel pour une plainte. Le panel a recommandé une suspension de trois mois au comité des normes. Le chef du conseil a souligné l'importance de respecter le code de conduite et de maintenir des normes élevées dans la fonction publique.

xsum.src: saturday 's incident involved an mv-22 osprey belonging to the us marines based in okinawa , japan . the third marine expeditionary force said they had shifted their operations to recovery efforts , which could last several months . families of the three marines have been notified . the circumstances of the incident off the east coast of australia are still under investigation , a statement said . `` as the sea state permits , recovery efforts will be conducted to further search , assess and survey the area , in coordination and with assistance from the australian defence force , '' it added . the mv-22 osprey is a tilt-rotor aircraft similar to a conventional plane but has helicopter-like rotor blades which allow it to take off vertically , without a runway . there were 26 people on board including the crew . australia 's daily telegraph newspaper quoted military sources as saying the aircraft had been trying to land on the uss ronald reagan aircraft carrier . us military forces have been operating in the area as part of a joint training exercise called talisman sabre . it involved some 30,000 personnel from both countries .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Un faucon de poisson MV-22 s'est écrasé sur la côte est de l'Australie samedi, entraînant la mort de trois Marines., Et les efforts de récupération sont en cours et devraient durer plusieurs mois.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Un avion MV-22 Osprey appartenant aux Marines américains basés à Okinawa, au Japon, s'est écrasé au large de la côte est de l'Australie samedi dernier. Les opérations de récupération sont en cours et pourraient durer plusieurs mois. Les familles des trois Marines à bord ont été informées et les circonstances de l'incident font l'objet d'une enquête. Le MV-22 Osprey est un avion à rotors basculants qui peut décoller verticalement sans piste d'atterrissage. Il y avait 26 personnes à bord, dont l'équipage, et l'avion aurait tenté d'atterrir sur le porte-avions USS Ronald Reagan. Les forces militaires américaines et australiennes mènent un exercice d'entraînement conjoint appelé Talisman Sabre, impliquant environ 30 000 personnes.

xsum.src: the 21-year-old was also suspended for four months backdated to 23 may although three of those months have been suspended until 1 july 2016 . townsend had already voluntarily withdrawn from the england squad for the european under-21 championship . it is believed he was not accused of betting on games he had involvement in . however , the fa has strict betting rules that forbid gambling on a wide spectrum of fixtures laid out in its regulations . the length of the up-front ban , coupled with the fact that he withdrew from the england under-21 squad , mean he will not miss a game . the midfielder , who was on loan at qpr for the second half of the season , is a product of tottenham 's academy and signed as a trainee in 2008 . he has had loan spells at yeovil , leyton orient , mk dons , ipswich , watford , millwall , leeds , birmingham and , most recently , with former spurs manager harry redknapp at qpr . townsend made his premier league debut for spurs in september 2012 before joining rangers in january , where he made 12 premier league appearances , scoring twice .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Le joueur de 21 ans, Andros Townsend, a été interdit pendant quatre mois pour avoir violé les règles de paris de l'Association de football anglaise.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Andros Townsend, joueur de Tottenham, a été suspendu pour quatre mois par la FA pour violation des règles de paris. La suspension est rétroactive au 23 mai, mais trois mois ont été suspendus jusqu'en juillet 2016. Townsend s'était déjà retiré de l'équipe d'Angleterre pour le championnat d'Europe des moins de 21 ans. Il n'a pas été accusé de parier sur des matchs dans lesquels il était impliqué, mais la FA a des règles strictes en matière de paris. La suspension initiale, combinée à son retrait de l'équipe nationale, signifie qu'il ne manquera aucun match. Townsend, formé à Tottenham, a été prêté à QPR pour la deuxième moitié de la saison. Il a également été prêté à plusieurs autres clubs avant cela. Il a fait ses débuts en Premier League en 2012 et a marqué deux buts en 12 matchs pour QPR.

xsum.src: the 18-year-old man is still in hospital after the incident at leicester 's west gate school on 27 january . the school subsequently suspended three female members of staff . police confirmed the women were arrested in connection with allegations of neglect offences and then bailed pending further inquiries . chair of governors , the rev canon peter taylor , said : `` a number of investigations are being carried out into the circumstances of this tragic incident . `` three members of staff have been suspended while these take place . '' a leicestershire police spokeswoman said the pupil `` sustained injuries as a result of getting into difficulty in a swimming pool in glenfield road . '' she added that the women `` aged 49 , 61 and 62 , have been arrested in connection with the incident on neglect offences '' . leicester city council and the health and safety executive -lrb- hse -rrb- are also investigating . the school - which caters for students aged four to 19 with learning difficulties and disabilities - was officially opened by prince edward last year .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Un garçon de 18 ans a été blessé au Westgate School Pool à Leicester le 27 janvier et trois membres du personnel ont été suspendus.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Un jeune homme de 18 ans est toujours à l'hôpital après un incident à l'école West Gate de Leicester le 27 janvier. Trois membres du personnel ont été suspendus et arrêtés pour négligence. Des enquêtes sont en cours et l'école, qui accueille des élèves avec des difficultés d'apprentissage, a été inaugurée par le prince Edward l'année dernière.

xsum.src: the clip , filmed in norwich city centre , shows two men coming to blows in front of a stationary bus at the corner of prince of wales road and upper king street . both are seen grappling on the pavement before more punches are thrown . bus operator stagecoach said a driver had been suspended . no arrests have been made . in the video , the bus driver picks up what appears to be a badge from the middle of the street . for more norfolk stories , visit the bbc 's local live page for the county he returns to the bus , and the two men continue to trade insults . andy campbell , managing director of stagecoach east , confirmed a bus driver had been suspended . `` we understand on-street video footage of part of the incident has subsequently been posted on social media '' , he said . the company will launch its own investigation , and help police with their enquiries , he added . norfolk police said they were called to prince of wales road just before 16:00 bst on wednesday . they located one of the men when they arrived at the scene and were appealing for witnesses .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Une vidéo d'un combat qui a eu lieu dans le centre-ville de Norwich a été publiée sur les réseaux sociaux, le chauffeur de bus impliqué a été suspendu et deux hommes pendant le combat font l'objet d'une enquête par la police.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Une vidéo montre deux hommes se battant devant un bus à Norwich. Le chauffeur de bus a été suspendu et la police enquête sur l'incident. La vidéo a été publiée sur les réseaux sociaux et la société de bus mènera sa propre enquête. La police a été appelée sur les lieux et a lancé un appel à témoins.

xsum.src: jamie cox was sentenced to 26 weeks for common assault after he attacked viktoria gribovskaja at her home in lambeth , south london last year . the swindon-based wbo european super-middleweight title holder had denied assault . his sentence was suspended at an appeal at croydon magistrates ' court . the 29-year-old boxer , who appeared in court under his real name jamie russan was told his conviction still stands , but that his prison sentence will be suspended for 18 months . recorder joseph boothby told him he should treat the suspended sentence as `` a turning point '' and said : `` change your ways and think before you get angry with a girlfriend , or anyone else for that matter . '' cox had been sentenced to 26 weeks in prison for the assault and harassment charges , 20 weeks for violence to secure entry and 12 weeks for criminal damage , to run concurrently . he is currently ranked number four in the world and is also a commonwealth games light welterweight champion . after the hearing , cox said : `` i just want to get back to normal and to fight for world titles . i do not really treat today as a success . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: Le boxeur Jamie Cox a été emprisonné pour avoir pénétré l'introduction de son ex-petite amie Viktoria Gribovskaya à la maison et l'avoir agressée, mais la peine a été suspendue pendant 18 mois.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Jamie Cox, détenteur du titre de super-moyen européen de la WBO, a été condamné à 26 semaines de prison pour voies de fait après avoir agressé Viktoria Gribovskaja chez elle à Lambeth, dans le sud de Londres. Sa peine a été suspendue lors d'un appel devant le tribunal de Croydon et il a été averti de changer ses habitudes et de réfléchir avant de se mettre en colère contre sa petite amie ou toute autre personne. Cox est actuellement classé quatrième au monde et est également champion des Jeux du Commonwealth en poids léger welter. Il a déclaré qu'il voulait revenir à la normale et se battre pour des titres mondiaux.

xsum.src: the accident happened on the edinburgh bypass between baberton and dreghorn at about 17:00 on monday . police said a woman on the bus was taken to hospital with a `` serious leg injury '' . her injury is not thought to be life-threatening . four other people who suffered minor injuries were also taken to hospital but were later released . the eastbound lane of the road was closed following the accident causing lengthy tailbacks . it was re-opened at 18:45 .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Un accident s'est produit lors du contournement d'Edimbourg vers 17 heures.Lundi, cela a fait que cinq personnes se blessent.

La voie est de la route a été fermée pendant un certain temps, causant des embouteillages, mais a été rouverte à 18h45.

xsum.src: leah washington , 18 , and joe pugh , 19 , both from barnsley , were among four people badly injured on the smiler ride on 2 june when two carriages crashed . ms washington had a leg amputated and mr pugh suffered shattered knees . the event takes place at the metrodome arena in barnsley on 14 november and includes a pea and pies supper . midlands air ambulance , the royal stoke university hospital and staffordshire fire and rescue will benefit from the charity event . vicky balch , 20 , from lancashire , also had to have a leg amputated and daniel thorpe , 27 , from buxton , derbyshire , suffered serious leg injuries . twelve other people were trapped 25ft -lrb- 7.6 m -rrb- off the ground for several hours as emergency services attempted to rescue them .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Deux victimes de l'accident de montagnes russes du 2 juin organiseront un événement caritatif le 14 novembre pour collecter des fonds pour plusieurs organisations de secours.

xsum.src: the child was critically injured in the incident and later died in hospital . the freak accident happened at 15:00 local time -lrb- 19:00 gmt -rrb- on friday . the sun dial restaurant , where the incident took place , has reportedly been closed until further notice . according to a statement from atlanta police , the restaurant 's revolving floor automatically stopped moving when the child became stuck on friday . employees managed to dislodge the boy , who suffered crushing injuries to his head and brain , according to a report by the fulton county medical examiner . `` the kid was just wandering as kids will do . somehow he found himself in a critical situation where he 's lodged in between the rotating floor and the wall , '' police spokesman warren pickard told reporters on saturday . the boy 's death has been ruled accidental . the restaurant is located at the top of the westin hotel , an atlanta attraction that offers a 360-degree view of the city .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Vendredi, un enfant est décédé des blessés de manière critique après s'être retrouvé coincé entre un sol tournant et un mur au restaurant solaire à Atlanta, la police a jugé un accident.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Un enfant est décédé après avoir été coincé dans le sol tournant d'un restaurant à Atlanta. La police a déclaré que la mort était accidentelle et que l'enfant s'était retrouvé coincé entre le sol tournant et le mur en marchant autour du restaurant. Le restaurant est situé au sommet d'un hôtel offrant une vue à 360 degrés sur la ville.

xsum.src: police and fire crews were called to the scene , close to lesmahagow , at about 10:30 on friday after a tanker carrying highly-flammable ethanol caught fire . no-one was injured as a result of the blaze . the motorway was closed in both directions for several hours , with queues of up to nine miles reported . about 100 firefighters were involved in efforts to extinguish the blaze . deputy assistant chief officer paul connelly , from the scottish fire and rescue service , said : `` the nature of the fuel involved in the fire meant it was both intense and very difficult to extinguish . `` large volumes of water were deployed from multiple jets and our crews also conducted several foam strikes to smother the flames . `` considerable resources were mobilised from across the west of scotland to conduct a safe and effective firefighting operation , which has ultimately seen the fire extinguished . he added : `` our crews will remain at the scene over the coming hours while the remaining ethanol is removed from the vehicle . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: Vendredi, un camion-citerne transportant de l'éthanol a pris feu sur l'autoroute vendredi et l'incendie a duré plusieurs heures avant d'être éteint.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Un camion-citerne transportant de l'éthanol a pris feu près de Lesmahagow, en Écosse, vendredi matin. Personne n'a été blessé et environ 100 pompiers ont travaillé pour éteindre l'incendie. L'autoroute a été fermée pendant plusieurs heures et des ressources considérables ont été mobilisées pour mener une opération de lutte contre l'incendie sûre et efficace. L'incendie a finalement été éteint et les équipes resteront sur place pour retirer le reste de l'éthanol du camion.

xsum.src: the most rev justin welby told worshippers at canterbury cathedral that the attacks risked `` causing us to act fearfully , to see a world in which fear triumphs '' . but he also said : `` on easter day hope decisively overcame fear '' . tuesday 's bombings in brussels killed 28 people and injured dozens . the archbishop said hope can seem far away and fear so close `` in the shadow of this week 's darkness '' . `` fear is reasonable , a normal human reaction , '' he added . pope delivers easter message of hope pm praises uk 's ` christian values ' `` easter proclaims to us in flesh and blood that fear and death and terror are not the last words . `` god has spoken life , hope and purpose . `` terror speaks of a world at war with itself , of faiths at each others ' throats . `` jesus christ reaches out not in exclusion but in embrace ; this is the feast of the victory of god , and we celebrate in the midst of darkness , by our worship and praise shining an unquenchable light . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: Justin Welby a encouragé les croyants à la cathédrale de Canterbury à ne pas céder à la crainte, mais à le surmonter par le culte et les éloges après les bombardements de mardi à Bruxelles qui ont tué 28 personnes et blessé des dizaines de plus.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: L'archevêque Justin Welby a déclaré que les attaques à Bruxelles risquaient de nous faire agir avec crainte, mais que le jour de Pâques, l'espoir avait triomphé de la peur. Il a également souligné que la peur était une réaction humaine normale, mais que Pâques nous rappelle que la peur, la mort et la terreur ne sont pas les derniers mots. Le pape a également délivré un message d'espoir pour Pâques, tandis que le Premier ministre a salué les valeurs chrétiennes du Royaume-Uni. L'archevêque a conclu en disant que Jésus-Christ tend la main pour embrasser, et que Pâques est une fête de la victoire de Dieu, célébrée au milieu des ténèbres avec une lumière inextinguible grâce au culte et à la louange.

xsum.src: the attacker , a 27-year-old swiss man , also died on sunday , they said . five other people were hurt when the man set fire to the train and stabbed passengers in the attack on saturday . two of them , including a six-year-old child , are in a serious condition . police have said that , as yet , there is no indication of a political or terrorist motive for the attack . the attack occurred around 14:20 -lrb- 12:20 gmt -rrb- as the train was approaching salez station , between the towns of buchs and sennwald . several dozen passengers were on board at the time . in a statement -lrb- in german -rrb- , st gallen cantonal police said video evidence from inside the train showed the attacker , armed with a knife , pouring out a flammable liquid . six people - including the attacker - were injured . the seventh injured person was a man on the platform who pulled the burning attacker off the train . forensic experts are analysing the flammable liquid and the scene of the crime . police said the attacker lived in a canton adjoining st gallen . his address has been searched . on the basis of the video evidence , police say the man acted alone .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Un homme suisse de 27 ans a mis le feu dans un train et a poignardé des passagers samedi, et l'attaquant était décédé dimanche.
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Un homme suisse de 27 ans a attaqué un train en Suisse samedi, tuant une femme et blessant cinq autres personnes avant de mourir lui-même dimanche. L'attaque a eu lieu vers 14h20 alors que le train approchait de la gare de Salez. La police a déclaré qu'il n'y avait pour l'instant aucune indication d'un motif politique ou terroriste pour l'attaque. L'attaquant, armé d'un couteau, a versé un liquide inflammable à l'intérieur du train avant de blesser six personnes, dont lui-même. Un homme sur le quai a réussi à retirer l'attaquant en feu du train. Les autorités ont fouillé le domicile de l'attaquant et ont confirmé qu'il avait agi seul. Deux des blessés sont dans un état grave, dont un enfant de six ans. Les autorités continuent d'enquêter sur l'incident.

xsum.src: 27 december 2016 last updated at 09:00 gmt german shepherd finn was injured early one october morning while protecting his handler from a suspected armed robber . the seven-year-old fought for survival , helped every step of the way by his handler pc dave wardell . bbc news looks back at how his recovery captured the hearts of thousands and inspired a petition calling on the government to re-think the laws surrounding injured police support animals .
xsum.element-aware_summary: En octobre, Finn, un berger allemand de sept ans, a dévié l'attaque d'un agresseur pour son gestionnaire, et son gestionnaire a appelé le gouvernement à reconsidérer les lois sur la protection des animaux
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Le 27 décembre 2016, le berger allemand Finn a été blessé en protégeant son maître, le policier Dave Wardell, d'un suspect armé. Sa guérison a captivé des milliers de personnes et a inspiré une pétition pour revoir les lois sur les animaux de soutien blessés de la police.

xsum.src: sannah javid , 26 , of frank slater house , green lane , ilford , was taken to king george hospital on tuesday after officers were called to her flat . she died in the early hours of wednesday . post-mortem tests found the cause of death was multiple injuries . metropolitan police detectives believe ms javid knew her attacker . the force said a 37-year-old man was arrested on suspicion of her murder on saturday . det ch insp tim duffield added : `` we are appealing for anyone who may have seen or heard something suspicious on the evening of tuesday , 2 december to call the incident room at hendon .
